bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, smooth weld fully manipulated tubing, FACT carbon seatstays w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing, integrated headset, rack and fender eyelets

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon legs, aluminum crown & steerer, fender eyelets
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer with 20mm of spacers
Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Body Geometry locking Comfort Grips open-end with plug, alloy barend
Tektro linear pull, cold-forged, cartridge pads
Tektro linear pull, cold-forged, cartridge pads
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Forged alloy Hub, sealed bearings, 28 hole, for J bend round spokes
Specialized All Condition Armadillo Elite, 700x28c, Aramid bead, 120TPI, w/ lightweight puncture protection
Specialized All Condition Armadillo Elite, 700x28c, Aramid bead, 120TPI, w/ lightweight puncture protection
Specialized Elite, carbon wrapped alloy, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
